Just a Bunch of Hocus Pocus Charm Bracelet Halloween Bracelet

Handmade Hocus Pocus inspired Halloween Charm Bracelet.

It’s one of the best Halloween movies of all time!

They smell children, glorious mornings make them sick and it’s amuck, amuck, amuck!!!

The three sister witches are hysterical!

Remember it’s all just a bunch of hocus pocus.
